programme.title: The Comeback Trail
programme.desc: Two movie producers who owe money to the Mob set up their aging star actor for an insurance scam to try and save themselves, but they wind up getting more than they ever imagined. Crime comedy, starring Robert De Niro, Tommy Lee Jones and Morgan Freeman George Gallo - Director Robert De Niro - Max Barber Tommy Lee Jones - Duke Montana Morgan Freeman - Reggie Fontaine Zach Braff - Walter Creason Emile Hirsch - James Moore Eddie Griffin - Devon Wilton Patrick Muldoon - Frank Pierce.

programme.title: Gunpowder Milkshake
programme.desc: In her turbulent life as a professional assassin, Scarlet was cruelly forced to abandon her daughter Sam and go on the run. Years later, despite the estrangement, Sam has also grown up into a cold-blooded hitwoman. After a high-stakes mission spins out of control, Sam has no choice but to go rogue. This ultimately leads her back to her mother and her former sidekicks, who join forces against those who took everything from them. Action thriller, starring Karen Gillan and Lena Headey Navot Papushado - Director Karen Gillan - Sam Lena Headey - Scarlet Carla Gugino - Madeleine Michelle Yeoh - Florence Angela Bassett - Anna May Chloe Coleman - Emily Paul Giamatti - Nathan.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-June 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Pride
programme.desc: The Cinema List celebrates Pride this week, exploring some of our favourite LGBTQ+ films. From I Saw the TV Glow to Saving Face, check out this list that pushed cinema forward.

programme.title: 10 Lives
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Drama, Animation, Family, Fantasy ║ 2024 ║ U
programme.desc: A spoiled, selfish cat carelessly loses his ninth life, but winds up being reincarnated as a different animal in each of his next lives. programme.title: Breaking Point
programme.desc: Two adopted brothers are estranged after the loss of their mother. However, united in their love of breakdancing, they attempt to win the World Breaking Championship. Drama, starring Karam Singh, Kelvin Clarke and Hannah John-Kamen Max Giwa - Director Dania Pasquini - Director.

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: Franklin, a blogger, scuppers an attack against tech guru Anton Burrell, and finds a ring that the pioneering genius dropped. The device gives its wearer the ability to travel 57 seconds into the past, so Franklin decides to use it to take revenge against the pharmaceutical company responsible for his sister's death. programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Josh Hartnett and Charithra Chandran. Ex-CIA agent Lucas Reyes is tasked with boarding an international flight in order to identify and apprehend a mysterious hacker. programme.title: To Olivia

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Kate Winslet. As the Second World War rages, American fashion model-turned-photographer Elizabeth "Lee" Miller defies the expectations of the era and travels to mainland Europe as a war correspondent for Vogue. However, the evening takes a turn when he unveils his elaborate plan seeking revenge for their betrayals, and to play, they will have to give up the one thing they've spent their lives trying to keep - their secrets. As the game unfolds, thieves break in and they must band together to survive a night of terror. programme.title: Paycheck
programme.sub-title: Mystery, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Action ║ 2003 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Sci-fi action thriller directed by John Woo and based on a short story by Philip K Dick, starring Ben Affleck, Aaron Eckhart and Uma Thurman. programme.desc: Drama starring Eddie Peng. After spending time in prison for manslaughter, taciturn former stunt rider and musician Lang returns to his home town in remote north west China. programme.desc: Former Royal Navy officer Bernie Jordan is happily settled with wife Rene at a care home. Bernie needs to make the trip to Normandy for personal reasons, and with Rene's blessing, he sneaks off to pay his respects. programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock and symbiote partner-in-crime Venom are lying low in Mexico City, on the run for the apparent murder of detective Patrick Mulligan. The cop and his bonded entity, Toxin, are actually alive at the Imperium symbiote containment programme, beneath the Area 51 US Air Force facility in the Nevada desert. Knull, the symbiotes' immortal creator, dispatches hunters to locate Venom's hidden power source, the Codex, which can set Knull free to terrorise the multiverse. programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock and symbiote partner-in-crime Venom are lying low in Mexico City, on the run for the apparent murder of detective Patrick Mulligan. programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: Unbeaten in 10 in the Premier League, a Bournemouth side who ran rampant on Tyneside take on third-placed Nottingham Forest as the race to qualify for Europe next season rolls on. (25.01).

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: A three-game winning run brought to a halt at Craven Cottage sees Arsenal go for all three points here, as a refreshed Everton pay a Premier League visit to the Emirates Stadium. (14.12).

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: A week on from their 2-2 draw away in Manchester, Arsenal return to the Emirates as they host a Leicester side still searching for their first Premier League win of the season. (28.09).

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: Without a Premier League win in four attempts, Mikel Arteta's Arsenal target a return to winning ways against a Nottingham Forest side level on 19 points with the Gunners. (23.11).

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: Winless Southampton visit the home of Arsenal, whose unbeaten start to the Premier League campaign continued last week with a stoppage-time victory over Leicester at the Emirates. (05.10).

programme.title: Premier League Years 2008/09
programme.desc: Enjoy a look back at all of the most memorable moments from the 2008-2009 Premier League season. West Brom, Stoke and Hull were the league's newly promoted sides.

programme.title: Gary Neville's Soccerbox: Zola
programme.desc: Gary Neville sits down with Chelsea great Gianfranco Zola to discuss their time in the game and some of the most notable matches in which they played.

programme.title: Gary Neville's Soccerbox: Wright
programme.desc: Gary Neville sits down with Ian Wright to discuss their time in the game and some of the most notable matches in which they played.

programme.title: PL Retro:Liverpool v Man City 2018
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic clash. Here, Liverpool host Manchester City back in January 2018 at Anfield in a twisting, turning thriller. Would City maintain their unbeaten record?

programme.title: PL 100 Club: Mo Salah
programme.desc: A celebration of some of the finest goalscorers in Premier League history. This episode features the best of Mo Salah's strikes for Liverpool.

programme.title: PL 100 Club: Sadio Mane
programme.desc: A celebration of Liverpool's Senegalese maestro, Sadio Mané; the third player from the continent of Africa to reach the illustrious Premier League 100 club.

programme.title: Premier League Icons: Carlos Tevez
programme.desc: A look at some of the most famous, iconic stars to have graced the Premier League. Here, the spotlight is on Argentine forward Carlos Tevez, who enjoyed success with both Manchester clubs.

programme.title: Premier League Icons: Yaya Toure
programme.desc: A look at some of the most famous, iconic stars to have graced the Premier League. Here, the spotlight is on powerful midfielder Yaya Toure, who enjoyed success with Man City.

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: West Ham bring a pair of top-flight defeats to the Emirates as Graham Potter's side face Arsenal. The Gunners needed a late Mikel Merino brace to get past Leicester last Saturday. (22.02).

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: Arsenal attempt to go again in their pursuit of an elusive Premier League title with the visit of Wolves. The Gunners fell two points shy of eventual champions City last season. (17.08).

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: With three European wins in three, Villa target a third home win of the Premier League campaign as Bournemouth arrive. The Cherries put two unanswered goals past Arsenal last week. (26.10).

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: Crystal Palace return to Premier League action sat in the bottom three as Oliver Glasner's side face a tough test on the road at Villa Park against Unai Emery's Aston Villa. (23.11).

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: A Premier League clash at Villa Park with both teams coming from defeat, as European hopefuls Aston Villa and relegation-threatened Ipswich target a return to winning ways. (15.02).

programme.title: Premier League Highlights 24/25
programme.desc: Leicester and Ruud van Nistelrooy visit Aston Villa looking to overturn a run of four straight defeats in the Premier League. Villa were pegged back by Brighton earlier this week. (04.01).

programme.title: Gary Neville's Soccerbox: Scholes
programme.desc: Gary Neville sits down with former teammate Paul Scholes to discuss their time in the game and some of the most notable matches in which they played.

programme.title: Gary Neville's Soccerbox: Fowler
programme.desc: Gary Neville sits down with former Liverpool striker Robbie Fowler to discuss their time in the game and some of the most notable matches in which they played.

programme.title: We're Not Really Here: Man City
programme.desc: Manchester City are one of football's elite clubs, but 20 years ago they were languishing in the third tier of the English game. It proved to be a pivotal season in their history.

programme.title: Transfer 360: Juninho
programme.desc: Find out the inside story of Juninho's move to Middlesbrough. Hear from Bryan Robson, ex-teammates and Juninho himself on how a Brazilian star ended up signing for a newly promoted club.

programme.title: Class Of '92: Full Time
programme.desc: Class of '92-owned Salford City embark on their first season in the Football League - but the club are finding life in the new division tougher than expected. (S3, ep 1).

programme.desc: A look at some of the most iconic stars to have graced the Premier League. Here, the spotlight is on powerful former Everton forward Duncan Ferguson.

programme.title: Austrian F1 GP Highlights 2022
programme.desc: A sea of orange and a speedy Red Bull powered Max Verstappen to victory in the Sprint, as the Dutchman lines up at the front of the grid for the 2022 Austrian Grand Prix.

programme.title: Australian F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: A McLaren one-two forms the front row for the Australian Grand Prix, as Lando Norris leads from Oscar Piastri. Max Verstappen starts third, while Lewis Hamilton begins from P8. (16.03).

programme.title: Chinese F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: It's a first Grand Prix pole for Oscar Piastri as George Russell splits the McLarens with Lando Norris starting third. Sprint winner Lewis Hamilton comes from fifth on the grid. (23.03).

programme.title: Japanese F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: It's lights out at Suzuka for the Japanese Grand Prix. World champion Max Verstappen starts from the front of the grid with the McLaren duo of Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri behind. (06.04).

programme.title: Bahrain F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: It's lights out for the 2025 Bahrain Grand Prix. Oscar Piastri holds pole position with his McLaren teammate Lando Norris down in P6. Charles Leclerc joins Piastri on the front row. (13.04).

programme.title: Saudi Arabian F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: It's lights out in Jeddah for the 2025 Saudi Arabian Grand Prix. Reigning world champion Max Verstappen crossed the finish line in P1 last season at the Jeddah Corniche Circuit. (20.04).

programme.title: Miami F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: Polesitter Max Verstappen is joined by Lando Norris and Kimi Antonelli heading into turn one, while Lewis Hamilton tries to fight through the field from P12. (04.05).

programme.title: Emilia Romagna F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: It's lights out at Imola for the 2025 Emilia Romagna Grand Prix. Last season, reigning world champion Max Verstappen held off a late Lando Norris charge to claim race victory. (18.05).

programme.title: Monaco F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: On the streets of Monte Carlo, the 2025 Monaco Grand Prix arrives. Lando Norris lines up in P1 with Charles Leclerc behind him as the Monegasque pursues back-to-back home wins. (25.05).

programme.title: Spanish F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: It's an all-papaya front row as McLaren lead the way with Oscar Piastri from Lando Norris. Max Verstappen and George Russell form the second row, while Lewis Hamilton starts P5. (01.06).

programme.title: Canadian F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: It's lights out for the Canadian Grand Prix as George Russell and Max Verstappen line-up alongside each other at the front with Oscar Piastri in third. Lando Norris comes from P7. (15.06).

programme.title: EFL 17/18: Bristol City v Man Utd
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL Cup. Here, Bristol City host Premier League Man Utd at Ashton Gate in the 2017-18 competition's quarter-finals.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: Leeds v Bristol City
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, Leeds United host Bristol City at Elland Road in the Sky Bet Championship in a match that saw a dramatic comeback.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: Arsenal v Man City
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL Cup. Here, Arsenal and Man City go head-to-head in the final of the 2017-18 competition at Wembley.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: Aston Villa v Wolves
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, Aston Villa host Wolves at Villa Park in a memorable Midlands derby in the 2017-18 campaign.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: Fulham v QPR
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, promotion-chasing Fulham host QPR at Craven Cottage in a west London derby that saw a memorable comeback.

programme.title: Travelers Championship 2017 Hlts
programme.desc: The 2017 Travelers Championship at TPC River Highlands. One of the most well-attended events on the PGA Tour, Scotland's Russell Knox is the defending champion.

programme.title: Playing Lessons: Patty Tavatanakit
programme.desc: Former and current pros take viewers behind the ropes on the course, discussing such things as shot setup, club selection, and strategy. Here, Patty Tavatanakit leads the lesson.

programme.title: Playing Lessons: Kamaiu Johnson
programme.desc: With multiple wins on the APGA Tour, Kamaiu Johnson joins Bones on the course to share his tips and strategies for optimum success.

programme.title: Women's PGA Championship
programme.desc: Opening-day action from the 2025 KPMG Women's PGA Championship, the next women's Major on the 2025 calendar, taking place at Fields Ranch in Frisco, Texas.

programme.title: LIVE: R&A Men's Amateur C'Ship
programme.desc: Quarter-final action from the 2025 Amateur Championship. With exemptions into The Open and the US Open as well as an invitation to play in the Masters, it's all to play for.

programme.title: Rose Ladies Series Golf
programme.desc: Highlights from the 2025 Rose Ladies Series, as St George's Hill Golf Club in Surrey staged the fourth one-day event of six.

programme.title: LIVE: R&A Men's Amateur C'Ship
programme.desc: Semi-final action from the 2025 Amateur Championship. With exemptions into The Open and the US Open as well as an invitation to play in the Masters, it's all to play for in the south-east.

programme.title: ICC Men's T20 WC: ENG v IND 2007
programme.desc: Over the years, the ICC Men's T20 World Cup has thrown up a host of classic encounters. Here, revisit England's 2007 contest with India at the inaugural edition of the competition.

programme.title: ICC Men's T20 WC: ENG v IND 2009
programme.desc: Over the years, the ICC Men's T20 World Cup has thrown up a host of classic encounters. Here, revisit England's 2009 clash with India at Lord's.

programme.title: Rose Ladies Series Golf
programme.desc: Highlights from the 2025 Rose Ladies Series, as St George's Hill Golf Club in Surrey staged the fourth one-day event of six.

programme.title: LIVE: NSL Semi- Finals
programme.desc: The Netball Super League play-offs begin with the major semi-final between first and second. The winner here advances to the grand final, while the loser competes in the preliminary final.

programme.title: LIVE: NSL Semi- Finals
programme.desc: The 2025 Netball Super League play-offs continue with the minor semi-final as third meets fourth. The winner here will face the loser of the major semi-final in the preliminary final.

programme.title: ICC Men's T20 WC: ENG v IND 2007
programme.desc: Over the years, the ICC Men's T20 World Cup has thrown up a host of classic encounters. Here, revisit England's 2007 contest with India at the inaugural edition of the competition.

programme.title: ICC Men's T20 WC: ENG v IND 2009
programme.desc: Over the years, the ICC Men's T20 World Cup has thrown up a host of classic encounters. Here, revisit England's 2009 clash with India at Lord's.

programme.title: ATP Final: Indian Wells
programme.desc: Britain's Jack Draper competes in his maiden ATP Masters 1000 final at Indian Wells as the top-10 bound Brit faces Holger Rune. Draper knocked out Carlos Alcaraz in the last four. (16.03).

programme.title: PL Greatest Games: MU v Chel 19/20
programme.desc: A look at some memorable matches in the Premier League. Here, Frank Lampard made his managerial debut as his Chelsea side visited Old Trafford to face Manchester United.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games: Nor v MC 19/20
programme.desc: A look at some memorable matches in the Premier League. Here, Norwich City faced top flight goliaths Manchester City at Carrow Road in the 2019-2020 season.

programme.title: S/Lge: St Helens v Leeds
programme.desc: St Helens play host to Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: Middlesbrough v Wolves
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, Middlesbrough host Wolves at the Riverside in 2018 in a game that saw the visitors reduced to nine men.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: Cardiff v Wolves
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, Cardiff City host Wolves at the Cardiff City Stadium in 2018 in a match that had a dramatic ending.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: Derby County v Cardiff
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, Derby County take on Cardiff City at Pride Park in the 2017-18 campaign in a match with implications in the play-off race.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: Derby County v Leeds
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, Derby County take on Marcelo Bielsa's Leeds United at Pride Park in a Championship match that saw five goals.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: West Brom v Leeds Utd
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, West Brom take on Leeds United at The Hawthorns in a high-scoring Championship match that saw one side dominate.

programme.title: 1st Test'25 Day1: ENG v IND Hlts
